00012 
00013 class FCDocument;
00014 
00015 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDPhysicsMaterial : public FCDEntity
00016 {
00017 private:
00018     DeclareObjectType(FCDEntity);
00019     float staticFriction;
00020     float dynamicFriction;
00021     float restitution;
00022 
00023 public:
00024     FCDPhysicsMaterial(FCDocument* document);
00025     virtual ~FCDPhysicsMaterial();
00026 
00027     // Accessors
00028     virtual Type GetType() const { return FCDEntity::PHYSICS_MATERIAL; }
00029     float GetStaticFriction() const { return staticFriction; }
00030     void  SetStaticFriction(float _staticFriction) { staticFriction = _staticFriction; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00031     float GetDynamicFriction() const { return dynamicFriction; }
00032     void  SetDynamicFriction(float _dynamicFriction) { dynamicFriction = _dynamicFriction; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00033     float GetRestitution() const { return restitution; }
00034     void  SetRestitution(float _restitution) { restitution = _restitution; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00035 
00036     // Cloning
00037     virtual FCDEntity* Clone(FCDEntity* clone = NULL, bool cloneChildren = false) const;
00038 
00039     // Parse COLLADA document's <material> element
00040     virtual bool LoadFromXML(xmlNode* physicsMaterialNode);
00041 
00042     // Write out the <material> element to the COLLADA XML tree
00043     virtual xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const;
00044 };
